define object <character>
speak {
set string <talk[1]; Hello>
set string <talk[2]; Hi>
set string <talk[3]; What?>

set <talknum; $rand(1; 3)$>
msg <Character says, "#talk[talknum]#">

}
That should do it... If you're unsure how to put it in, just ask.
